entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain late in the morning. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
